pullrequest.title: Use sdformat prerelease until 2.0.1 is released

content.raw:
That would work, but we will probably forget to update it and it will continue working after the real release using the prerelease without any signal.

What about something like?
```
#!bash

if ${USE_OLD_SDFORMAT}; then
    sdformat_pkg="sdformat"
else
    sdformat_pkg="libsdformat2-dev"
    sdf_version=$(apt-cache show sdformat | grep Version: | sed 's/Version: //g')
    # Remove after releasing sdformat 2.0.1
    if $(dpkg --compare-versions $sdf_version lt 2.0.1); then
	sdformat_pkg="libsdformat2-dev-prerelease"
    fi
fi
```
